mapper.select: select mr.* , m.name as mname, m.position as mposition , m2.name as cname, m2.position as cposition from member_requests mr left join member m on m.midx = mr.midx left join member m2 on m2.midx = mr.confirm_midx where mr.midx=#{midx} order by ridx desc
